Name: Glare Tag
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Shinx, Luxio, and Luxray.  Swap a Luxray Claw and a Luxray Fang for a Glare Tag at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
